sentence.Network_en: It is going to take clearing of this haziness for investors to back this stock.
sentence.Network_cn: 要让投资者支持新浪的股票,就需要厘清这种不确定的状态.

sentence.Network_en: A pronounced haziness may signify spoilage, while brilliant, clear or dull wines are generally sound.
sentence.Network_cn: 显著的模糊状态可能意味着葡萄酒变坏了, 而闪耀, 清晰或阴暗的葡萄酒通常都是健康的.
